entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:25 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
